selectedVerses.text: For see what earnestness this godly grief has produced in you, but also what eagerness to clear yourselves, what indignation, what fear, what longing, what zeal, what punishment! At every point you have proved yourselves innocent in the matter.
For godly grief produces a repentance that leads to salvation without regret, whereas worldly grief produces death.
"As for you, son of man, groan; with breaking heart and bitter grief, groan before their eyes.
Even in laughter the heart may ache, and the end of joy may be grief.
